name: Defense Commando TD
description:
Defense Commando TD

Defense Commando TD is an exciting tower defense game. Your objective is to defeat all the enemies before they reach your base. To achieve the best results, strategically place your towers. Each enemy defeated provides income for upgrading and building new towers. Test yourself to see how many waves of enemies you can handle.

Good Luck!

Controls
Mouse to Build, Upgrade and Sell Towers

Credits
Audio: FeelBoyMedia (https://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/)
2d Artist: JoeJoe

Updates
Click on enemies zoom the camera in out
New build effects
Added range visualization
